activities: Etsy is an online venue to connect buyers to sellers.  As set forth in our Privacy Policy, Etsy only uses personal information for billing purposes and appropriate communication purposes (not for unsolicited marketing email).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data processed by the organization within the scope of the Safe Harbor Framwork(s) includes name, address, email address, phone number, and other personal data.  The data covered is on line only.
